channel.title: How to add NPC's?
channel.description: Yeah im kinda new to this and ive been tinkering with the files in .java but i cant figure out how to add NPCs. right now i only have guards and rats (the ones you start with). can someone tell me how to add more?

item.title: How to add NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @Imlostru Imlostru

@Imlostru wrote:

Or If You Would Like To Do It Very Easily Just Type In

::npc NPCNUMBER
[/quote]
when u do that when the server restarts it goes away…[/quote]

plus it has no Hp >_>

item.title: How to add NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @n0vamage n0vamage
item.description:
@n0vamage wrote:

to add a npc go to autospawn.cfg and u should see somthing like this

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 2745 2375 5068 0 3104 5068 3104 5068 1 Jad spawn = 2740 2380 5075 0 2372 5062 2422 5117 1 tok-xil spawn = 2740 2420 5113 0 2372 5062 2422 5117 1 tok-xil spawn = 2740 2416 5105 0 2372 5062 2422 5117 1 tok-xil spawn = 2740 2402 5094 0 2372 5062 2422 5117 1 tok-xil spawn = 2740 2400 5077 0 2372 5062 2422 5117 1 tok-xil spawn = 213 3386 9787 0 3386 9787 3386 9787 1 random event guy spawn = 188 3380 9760 0 3380 9760 3380 9760 1 random event monk 1 spawn = 189 3368 9770 0 3368 9770 3368 9770 1 random event monk 2 spawn = 189 3382 9752 0 3382 9752 3382 9752 1 random event monk 3 spawn = 190 3346 9747 0 3346 9747 3346 9747 1 random event monk 4 spawn = 190 3371 9745 0 3371 9745 3371 9745 1 random event monk 5 spawn = 3200 3104 3933 0 3100 3929 3108 3937 1 chas elemental spawn = 166 2353 3165 0 2353 2165 2353 2165 1 gnome banker spawn = 132 2731 9170 1 2744 9150 2693 9213 1 monkey spawn = 2301 3250 3423 0 3250 3423 3250 3423 2 tele dude spawn = 1201 3267 3435 0 3267 3435 3267 3435 2 BD dude 1 spawn = 1199 3269 3435 0 3269 3435 3269 3435 2 BD dude 2 spawn = 535 2338 3185 0 2338 3185 2338 3185 2 fairy keeper in admin zone spawn = 535 3253 3438 0 3253 3438 3253 3438 2 fairy keeper in dummys spawn = 610 3250 3433 0 3250 3433 3250 3433 2 black gaurd spawn = 1451 2715 9167 1 2744 9150 2693 9213 2 tele dude
then go to where u want the npc to stand and type in ::mypos and type in the y and x coord where the go and restart ur client and when u log back on it should be there… thats how it worked for me

Read full topic

item.title: How to add NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @geeroy geeroy
item.description:
@geeroy wrote:

ok ive gone into npc.java and it says this:

public NPCs(int _npcId, int _npcType) {
npcId = _npcId;
npcType = _npcType;
direction = -1;
IsDead = false;
DeadApply = false;
actionTimer = 0;
RandomWalk = true;
StartKilling = 0;
IsUnderAttack = false;
IsClose = false;
for (int i = 0; i < Killing.length; i++) {
Killing[i] = 0;

is this the one i want?

Read full topic

item.title: How to add NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @Spider680 Spider680
item.description:
@Spider680 wrote:

you go under npchandler (or is it npc?) and then you go to the bottom of the list, i reccomend copying the line before it, then you put in the monster I.D. where the original one was then the coordinates of where you want it after that. its easier if you jsut folow the guidlines of one of the first lines for the npcs

Read full topic
